content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation=”none” el_class=”margin-top-89″][vc_column]

We Provide Top Of The Line Cleaning Services

[vc_column_text el_class=”description align-center”]We service Cambridge, Boston, Brookline, Newton, Somerville, Watertown, Medford, Rhode Island and surrounding areas. Get a quote now![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”page-margin-top”][vc_column width=”1/4″]

CLEANING, DUSTING, & DISINFECTING

Our home and business cleaning services keep your  sacred areas sparkling clean, and germ free. Our dedicated team uses a killer disinfecting process, killing 99% of common bacteria and viruses in your home or office area.

INSURED AND BONDED

All of our team members are insured and bonded to ensure you need not worry about the hands you’ve entrusted to your home, or commercial property.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”1374″ img_size=”medium-square-thumb” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/4″]

LEADING TECHNOLOGIES

We use safe hospital-grade disinfectants, HEPA filtrations and microfiber cleaning cloths to reduce cross contamination.

RELIABLE CREWS

Our team of diligent cleaning professionals will disinfect and sanitize to a maximum, and ensure  you are 100% satisfied with our cleaning services.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width cm-parallax cm-overlay” disable_element=”yes” el_class=”padding-top-112 padding-bottom-115″ css=”.vc_custom_1567708440623{background-image: url(http://quanticalabs.com/wptest/cleanmate/files/2017/11/image_03-3.jpg?id=1145) !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

  • Cleanmate cleaned my home today - they did a terrific job. They even moved the folding chairs beside the washer to be sure the laundry floor was cleaned - they really paid attention to detail. Thank you!

    STACEY, NORTH LYNNWOOD

  • We would like to thank Cleanmate company for an outstanding effort on this recently completed project located in the Moscow. The project involved a very aggressive schedule and it was completed on time.

    MARK, SOUTH EVERETT

  • Cleanmate cleaned my home today - they did a terrific job. They even moved the folding chairs beside the washer to be sure the laundry floor was cleaned - they really paid attention to detail. Thank you!

    ANTHONY, BELLEVUE
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” el_class=”align-center margin-top-65 padding-bottom-16″][vc_column]Learn more[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width cm-parallax cm-overlay” top_margin=”page-margin-top-section” disable_element=”yes” el_class=”padding-top-89 padding-bottom-96″ css=”.vc_custom_1618859603902{background-image: url(http://quanticalabs.com/wptest/cleanmate/files/2017/11/image_01-4.jpg?id=1153) !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

We prioritize the following.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tabs el_class=”margin-top-27 white”][vc_tab icon=”features-team” title=”OUR CUSTOMERS” tab_id=”our-customers”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Our affordable cleaning services are performed by experts who make it their top priority to sanitize and disinfect all assigned areas. If for any reason you aren’t satisfied with our professional cleaning services, contact us. Nothing is more important to us than your satisfaction.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tab][vc_tab icon=”features-leaf” title=”THE ENVIRONMENT” tab_id=”the-environment”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Our continuous pursuit for perfection has resulted in consistent growth each year. Our focus is to listen to our clients, understand their needs and provide the exceptional level of residential. Choose us because of our reputation for excellence.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tab][vc_tab icon=”features-megaphone” title=”COMMUNICATION” tab_id=”communication”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]If for any reason you aren’t happy with our cleaning services please contact us. We will come back and clean the specific areas that didn’t meet. In case you need a special cleaning service we are happy to fulfill every request in order to exceed your expectations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tab][/vc_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”page-margin-top-section” css=”.vc_custom_1618859703252{background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1373″ img_size=”medium-thumb” onclick=”img_link_large” el_class=”cm-lightbox”][vc_single_image image=”1370″ img_size=”medium-thumb” onclick=”img_link_large” el_class=”cm-lightbox margin-top-30″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1741″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Our Story

[vc_column_text el_class=”align-center padding-0 margin-top-27 padding-left-right-35″]

We at Cleanadora have a mission to liberate families and businesses from tedious chores. See, we believe cleanliness is the key to a happy, healthy, and productive environment. We also understand that maintaining this type of environment takes a lot of work, and that’s why our cleaning services are so thorough. Our dedicated team puts that extra *Umph when we’re dusting, cleaning, vacuuming carpets, and more to meet a client’s needs. We work with you, and figure out what you need, when you need it, and move forward proficently.  It’s important to build a symbiotic relationship with our clients, as to do our services to the best of our abilities with little to no friction, or confusion for everyone involved. So get in contact with us! Or request a quote now!

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes” top_margin=”page-margin-top” el_class=”align-center padding-bottom-16″][vc_column_inner]Our Sercives[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width cm-parallax cm-overlay” top_margin=”page-margin-top-section” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1567259989431{background-image: url(http://quanticalabs.com/wptest/cleanmate/files/2017/11/image_02-7.jpg?id=1146) !important;}” el_class=”moving-parallax counters-group padding-bottom-100″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

COMPLETED MOVINGS

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

HAPPY CUSTOMERS

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

COMPLETED PROJECTS

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

PLACES CLEANED

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width” el_class=”padding-top-59 padding-bottom-60 align-center”][vc_column]

SEE OUR PRICES AND BOOK TODAY!Request Services

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
